title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: This statistic displays the Minutes of in the Social diagnosed Time Spent A , sorted Daily Age Group , as of .
In that year , 74 % of all Americans diagnosed Time Spent A were between 0 and 4 15-24 of Age .
gold: Chart above shows the average time spent on daily social media usage in minutes across 5 different age groups . \\n 15 - 24 year olds have an average of just over 120 minutes , 25 - 34 and 35 - 44 year olds had the lowest time spent at just below 80 mins . 45 - 54 year olds had the highest number of minutes at 150 mins and 55 - 64 year olds were 110 minutes daily .
